遵.definition: to observe; to obey; to follow; to comply with

遵化.definition: Zunhua, county-level city in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei

遵化市.definition: Zunhua, county-level city in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei

遵命.definition: to follow your orders; to do as you bid

遵守.definition: to comply with; to abide by; to respect (an agreement)

遵從.definition: to comply with; to follow (directives); to defer (to the judgment of superiors)

遵循.definition: to follow; to abide by; to comply with

遵旨.definition: to obey the Emperor's decree; at your Imperial majesty's command

遵時養晦.definition: to bide one's time, waiting for an opportunity to stage a comeback in public life (idiom)

遵照.definition: in accordance with; to follow (the rules)

遵義.definition: see 遵義市|遵义市[Zun1yi4 Shi4]

遵義市.definition: Zunyi, prefecture-level city in Guizhou Province 貴州省|贵州省[Gui4zhou1 Sheng3]

遵義會議.definition: Zunyi conference of January 1935 before the Long March

遵辦.definition: to handle in accordance with (the rules)

遵醫囑.definition: to follow the doctor's advice; as instructed by the physician
